import React from 'react'; import { connect, } from 'react-redux'; import { Divider, Header, Image, Container, Table, Button, } from 'semantic-ui-react'; import { Link, } from 'react-router-dom'; const BlogView = ({ blog = {} }) => ( View All Blogs
{blog.name}
Description {blog.description} Author {blog.author} Version {blog.version} Price ${blog.price} Category {blog.category}
) const mapStateToProps = (state, props) => { return { blog: state.blogs.find( a => a.id === parseInt(props.match.params.id )) } } export default connect(mapStateToProps)(BlogView);
